Description.Name: Marked Territory
Description.Details:
<color=#BFBFBF>The Argo settles into high orbit above {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}. Most of the crew is off-duty or dispersed across the ship, but on the bridge, only Farah and you remain—running post-jump diagnostics in relative quiet.

Then the signal hits—a high-priority encrypted data burst, routed through a [[DM.Factions[faction_GhostBearWatch],Ghost Bear Watch]] relay. No signature. No authentication header. Just a blunt, silent transmission demanding attention.

Farah isolates the file and applies the decryption key Arelle had granted weeks ago. The system responds immediately. Lines of tactical intelligence unfold across the main display: sightings, signal traces, combat telemetry—all tied to thirteen different systems where [[DM.Factions[faction_MinnesotaTribe],Minnesota Tribe]] activity has been confirmed in the last sixty days.

It’s precise. Cold. Watch-grade formatting.

And then—tucked near the bottom of the packet—one very surprising line.</color>

<color=#DFDFDF>“System Status: MELIDRON – Occupied. Ghost Bear Watch Forward Command Active.”</color>

<color=#BFBFBF>Farah glances at you, brow furrowed.</color> “Since when does the Watch list themselves like that? I thought shadow ops were supposed to stay in the shadows.”

<color=#BFBFBF>The screen hums, still displaying the Ghost Bear emblem over a planet you just left.

Whatever’s happening out there—the masks are starting to slip.</color>

Description.Details: <color=#BFBFBF>Farah uploads the packet to navigation control. Thirteen systems are flagged with updated threat profiles and recent Tribe activity. One under Watch control. The war is spreading—and now you can see where.</color>
